name: Connect the Dots for Toddlers 2 - Educational Game
name_original: Connect the Dots for Toddlers 2 - Educational Game
description:
'Connect the Dots for Kids 2’ is one of our new fun entertaining educational games for kids from 2 to 5 years old. Playing the connect the dots game your baby will playfully learn new objects and words on the "fruit", "transport", "animals" topics in several languages.
Main features of the join the dots game:
- Playing the connect dots game your baby will be offered 3 topics at choice - fruit for kids, animals for children, transportation for kids. Each topic - either transport for kids or animals for toddlers or fruit puzzles for kids - contains 7 juicy pictures. To compose each picture your baby should join the dots in the right order by numbers. That means that a kid has to match dots from 1 to 2, then from 2 to 3 and so on.
- Playing dot to dot games for kids for free your child will meet the following objects: learn fruits name for kids - an apple, a pear, a strawberry, a pineapple, a watermelon, a banana, grapes; cars and transport for kids - a car, a motorcycle, a truck, a racing car, a bike, a tank, a train; connect the dots animals - a dog, an elephant, a cat, a fish, a horse, a rooster, a pig.
- There are different quantities of the dots to connect in these educational games for kids kindergarten. The learning games for kids will help your toddler recollect and repeat the numbers for toddlers learned before. It means that kids connect the dots free game can be considered as free learning games for kids 3 to 4 years old and learning games for 5 year olds. On the other hand, your baby can train and practice his or her knowledge of numbers for kids which he or she has been studying in our other learning games for toddlers age 2 and learning apps for toddlers ages 2 to 3.
- The puzzles for kids are available in several languages: English, Russian, Spanish and some others. Your child will be able to learn words in foreign languages. All the names of the objects displayed on the screen of this child learning educational apps are pronounced by native speakers. The pronunciation is clear and distinct which makes learning words for toddler flashcards easy. Playing such educational games for toddlers allows to broaden your kid’s vocabulary considerably.
- Like in any good educational apps for toddlers there are funny sounds and vibrations accompanying the learning games for kindergarten. Such puzzles games will cause great amusement to your child. If necessary, parents can disable both sounds and vibration of the toddler learning games in the parent’s cabinet. Rich, bright colors in every picture of this educational toddler games make the educational process interesting and exciting.
- We do our best to make all our kids educational game free for kindergarten clear and intuitive. So, connect the dots games for free have very simple and user-friendly interface which allows young children to play it by themselves. It’s important for learning games for toddlers age 3 and kids learning games free for a 4 year old because it develops a child’s independence.
- You can download all our children educational apps for free as well as these baby puzzles. Puzzles for toddlers free help save a family’s budget and get educational apps for kids of high quality.
How to play our toddler puzzles:
- At the beginning of the children puzzles free parents are recommended to choose the language of the game.
- On the screen of baby puzzles for two year old, your child will see 3 pictures - with fruit name game for kids, animals and transport. Your baby should choose one of connect the numbers.
- Your toddler has to connect the dots one by one in the correct order by numbers. If the child's choice of the next dot is wrong, the line won't be drawn in the puzzles for kids under 5.
- After the full contour of the toddler puzzle games free for 3 year olds is ready, the kid will be shown a beautiful picture.
Connecting dots your baby will also train fine motor skills which is important for speaking activity.
